ThingDef.label: Revenant Talons faction device
ThingDef.description: An unknown device from the Revenant Talons faction. Activation of it requires Revenant Talons member's identification.\n\nUse this device for the true Revenant Talons faction style start.

li.useMessage: Your home faction pardons you for this major discovery. Your punishment is to lead this new independent operating base with your own power, and they provide some new intel maps.
